Leg Joint Mobility.name: Hip Circular Rotations
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Standing on one leg, rotate your other leg in a circular motion, making the circles gradually larger.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Deep Bodyweight Squats
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, squat down as low as comfortable while keeping heels on the ground.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Cossack Squats
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Start in a wide stance, shift weight to one leg and squat to that side while extending the other leg.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Seated Butterfly Stretch
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Sit with soles of feet together, knees out to sides, gently press knees toward floor.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Ankle Mobility Drill
Leg Joint Mobility.description: In a lunge position with front foot flat, gently push knee forward over toes without heel lifting.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Knee Circles
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Standing on one leg, bend the other slightly and rotate at the knee joint.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Figure-4 Stretch
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Lying on back, cross one ankle over opposite knee, pull uncrossed leg toward chest.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Standing Quad Stretch
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Standing on one leg, grab the other foot behind you, pulling heel toward buttock.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Dynamic Hamstring Stretch
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Standing, swing one leg forward with straight knee, keeping torso upright.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Standing Calf Raises and Drops
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Stand on edge of step with heels hanging off, raise up onto toes and slowly lower heels below step level.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Leg Swings
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Hold onto something for balance and swing each leg forward and backward, then side to side.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Ankle Circles
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Rotate each ankle clockwise and counterclockwise while seated or standing.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Side-Lying Leg Lifts
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Lie on your side and lift your top leg up and slightly back, engaging hip abductors.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Standing Forward Fold
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Bend forward from hips, letting arms hang toward floor, with a slight bend in knees.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Pigeon Pose
Leg Joint Mobility.description: From all fours, bring one knee forward and extend the other leg back, sinking hips down.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Frog Stretch
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Get on all fours, spread knees wide apart with feet in line with knees, then lower chest toward the floor.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Hip CARs (Controlled Articular Rotations)
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Stand and rotate one leg in a full circle with control, focusing on moving the hip joint through its full range of motion.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Ankle CARs
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Seated with leg extended, trace the largest possible circle with your toes, moving only from the ankle.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Thread the Needle
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Lie on your back with feet flat on floor, cross one ankle over opposite thigh, then thread hands through gap and pull toward chest.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Happy Baby Pose
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Lie on your back, grab the outsides of your feet with hands, and gently pull knees toward armpits.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Lizard Pose
Leg Joint Mobility.description: From a low lunge, place the front foot to the outside of the hand, lower to forearms if possible.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Wall Ankle Mobilization
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Stand facing a wall, place one foot close to wall and bend knee to touch wall while keeping heel down.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Balance on one leg, hinge at hips while extending other leg behind you, reaching fingertips toward ground.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Lateral Lunges
Leg Joint Mobility.description: Stand with wide stance, shift weight to one side bending that knee while keeping other leg straight.

Leg Joint Mobility.name: Adductor Rock
Leg Joint Mobility.description: In a wide stance, shift weight side to side while keeping both feet flat on the ground.
